General.Name: Yunnan Wenshan Electric Power Co Ltd
General.Description: China Southern Power Grid Energy Storage Co., Ltd. engages in hydroelectric power generation business. As of December 31, 2022, the total installed capacity of its operating units is 12.421 million kilowatts, including 10.28 million kilowatts of pumped storage, 111,000 kilowatts of new energy storage, and 2.03 million kilowatts of peak-shaving hydropower. The company was formerly known as Yunnan Wenshan Electric Power Co.,Ltd. China Southern Power Grid Energy Storage Co., Ltd. was founded in 1997 and is based in Guangzhou, China. China Southern Power Grid Energy Storage Co., Ltd. operates as a subsidiary of China Southern Power Grid Co.,Ltd.
